translations: adj.使用单一语言的；（文本或对话）单语的

sentences.sentence: David Graddol concludes that monoglot English graduates face a bleak economic future.
sentences.translation: 大卫·葛拉多尔认为，只会英语一种语言的毕业生面临着暗淡的经济前景。

sentences.sentence: When this was done, the monoglot babies had difficulty overcoming their learnt response, even when the researchers gave them further clues that a switch had taken place.
sentences.translation: 但也有很多老师却持反对意见，认为小孩子过早学习外语，容易在两种语言的转换中产生很多迷惑，最后甚至连母语都没有学到位。
